name: Business with Friends - Fun Social Business Game
name_original: Business with Friends - Fun Social Business Game
description:
Business Dice is a board game played with family, friends & kids.
Business Dice Game is Free to Download!

Business Dice is a Dice game that depends on Luck.
Business Dice is a king of board game.
Business Dice is a mind game.
Business Dice is one type of puzzle game.
Business Dice game is played all ages people like kids, young and old man game.
Business Dice is also known as Bankrupt and is very similar to a Spanish board game.
Business Dice game other name is Landlord.

Trade lands, build houses, win auctions, roll wheel to get prizes - have fun. it follows Asian Business Trade Game rule, we customize this Rule to the player convenience.

KEY FEATURE
- Realistic 3d dice graphics Board.
- Build houses by gaining experience in different rooms.
- Visits your favorite Business properties such as Club House and Best Home.
- Travel across classic Business properties to reach places around the world.
- Four Players can play at a time in Online.

Business Dice
Business Dice Plus
Board Games
Happy New year Business Dice Game
Business Dice 2018.


Business Dice Game played with:-
- Play against computer
- Play with Friends (Local Multiplayer)
- Play With People around the world.
- Play local multiplayer
- Play Online

The game is played between 2 to 4 players and you have the option of playing the game against the computer, against your friends, or even against people from around the world.

With plenty of features, Business Game brings you a really unique gaming experience.
